snippet.title: Grand Theft Auto 2 - Sony Playstation (PS1) - HD Gameplay
snippet.description: The was the only game on my radar for a long long time before release. I begged my mum to buy it for me when it came out, and rushed home to play it. At that age I had to convince myself it was fantastic, but deep down I knew it just wasn't. The game is ok, but the mission structure (the rep system unlocking missions) and the graphics just never done it for me. The cars looked unappealing and i never liked the atmosphere of the city. I admit the game ran much smoother and had better animation, but it never worked for me. The first game was still the king.
